commit message:
Readme updated with the testing link.
Play graphic is added.
When there is only 1 link to open. A toast info is shown.
Toast message is added in case where no Activity can handle the link.
warning is added for preferred apps too

Removed unnecessary IntentFilter calculation.
MATCH_ALL flag is used in Android Marshmallow to possibly get all the apps in the system.
bold text of host and app name in delete dialog
Used specific ContentUri for preferred Activities.

Removal animations are added to PreferredAppsActivity.

While doing it, all the custom click support and selection support are removed. Instead TwoWayView is used.
